short_summary: This solicitation is for the purchase of a laser engraver including delivery and training on its operation.
description: This solicitation cancels and supersedes previous solicitation number Doc4053355309 dated June 16, 2023.  A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to Offeror's who offered on the previous solicitation. The Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence is issuing this request for proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of a laser engraver including delivery and training on its operation in Alouette, Qu?b?c, Canada.
full_summary:
# W0138-22A051-B: Request for Proposal for a Laser Engraver

## Notice Title and Reference

* English: W0138-22A051-B: Request for Proposal for a Laser Engraver
* French: W0138-22A051-B: Demande de Proposition pour une Machine de Gravure au Laser

## Solicitation Details

* Reference Number: WS4053306635-Doc4137021516
* Solicitation Number: WS4053306635
* Publication Date: August 15, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: September 5, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT
* Amendment Date: August 22, 2023
* Expected Contract Start Date: August 1, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: August 1, 2024

## Request for Proposal

Public Works and Government Services Canada (TPSGC) is issuing this Request for Proposal (RFP) on behalf of the Department of National Defence for the acquisition of a laser engraver, including delivery and training on its operation. The RFP refers to the detailed requirements as outlined in the Annex “Statement of Requirements”.

## Bidder Requirements

* The bidder must submit a proposal that meets the requirements outlined in the RFP.
* The proposal must include a detailed description of the laser engraver, as well as the delivery and training services.
* The bidder must demonstrate experience and expertise in providing similar equipment and services to government departments.

## Evaluation Criteria

The proposals will be evaluated based on the lowest price, as outlined in the RFP.

## Contact Information

For any inquiries or questions concerning the RFP, please contact:

François S. Martineau
Public Works and Government Services Canada (TPSGC)
Email: [francois.s.martineau@tpsgc.gc.ca](mailto:francois.s.martineau@tpsgc.gc.ca)

## URLs and Attachments

* For more information, please visit: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17171012?extsite=MTcxNzEwMTJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>
* No attachments are available for this RFP.

Please note that this RFP is now expired. However, I have maintained the provided details to provide historical context. A debriefing session will be made available upon request to previous bidders.
